attributes.action: Give the second homes of MPs that have been paid for by taxpayers money to retired Gurkha soldiers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the British public want the Gurkhas to live in this country, they have done more for this country than any of the MPs in parliament. We want you and your banking friends to go and make room for the Gurkhas.
